title: #182 - Owen Benjamin & ME
description: Comedian Owen Benjamin and I hang in the Mancave - we break down two jokes we are working on, talk about the Orlando Shooting, Political Correctness, then Tom Segura calls in and Owen tell us about the time he had to walk out of Joey Diaz's Podcast due to an over prescription of THC...lastly I share with him my obsession with Google Trends.
